The following actors participate in the nomination of the best actor: Antonio Banderas is an actor in Pain and Glory as Salvador Mallo next Leonardo DiCaprio is an actor in Once Upon a Time in Hollywood as Rick Dalton next Adam Driver is an actor in Marriage Story as Charlie Barber next Joaquin Phoenix is an actor in Joker as Arthur Fleck and Jonathan Pryce is an actor in The Two Popes as Cardinal Jorge Mario Bergoglio
